title: Heather Teague /// Part 1 /// 411
description:
Heather Teague /// Part 1 /// 411

Part 1 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

Back in the Garage again! The Captain and Nic discuss a strange disappearance. Heather Teague was sunbathing at Newburgh Beach on August 26, 1995. A witness told authorities that he saw a Caucasian man approach Heather. The abductor allegedly grabbed Teague by the hair and dragged her into the woods at gunpoint. If you have any information please send to Sarah.Teague5@gmail.com
Beer of the Week - Lost marbles by Jackie O’s Brewery Garage Grade - 5 out of 5 bottle caps
